name: Recombination
description:
After starting too many projects and not finishing any, I decided to do a 1-Day challenge: create a game in a single day, and publish it as it is after that, no more polishing or extra features. So here is the result :)

The entire project was done by myself in a single day (about 10 hours), including design, art and programming.

Recombination is single player game where the objective is to get as many points as you can in the given time. To get points, you have to merge (recombine) two particles of the same type.
